alert.note: Alert for DeSoto; Panola; Tate (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 06 at 5:15PM CDT until September 06 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern DeSoto County in northwestern Mississippi... Tate County in northwestern Mississippi... North central Panola County in northwestern Mississippi... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 515 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Eudora, or 8 miles southwest of Hernando, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hernando, Senatobia, Coldwater, Como, Barr, Independence, Arkabutla, Phillipp, Eudora, Robinson Gin, Trinity, Looxahoma, Lurline, Frees Corners, Crossroad, McGhee, Love, Poagville, New Town and Bluff. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
